casebody.data:
SEA GULL LUBRICANTS, INC., AN OHIO CORPORATION (TO THE USE OF THE NATIONAL ACME COMPANY AND THE LAMSON & SESSIONS COMPANY, OHIO CORPORATIONS) v. THE UNITED STATES [No. 45081] [99 C. Cls. 716;

321 U. S. ]

Decided June 7, 1943; petition dismissed. Plaintiff’s motion for new trial overruled October 4,1943. Opinion 99 Cl Cls. 716.

Plaintiff’s petition for writ of certiorari denied by the Supreme Court February 28,1944.
